title: Swarna Rekha Vanki Bangles - Diamond Embrace
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold) with Natural Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and luster.
features: Modern interpretation of the classic Vanki, featuring a flowing, wave-like design (Rekha) studded with brilliant-cut diamonds in a prong setting. The open, airy design adds a touch of contemporary elegance while retaining the traditional essence of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold complemented by the sparkling brilliance of white Diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated statement piece for modern celebrations. Suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and contemporary events.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and modernity, these bangles are a testament to fine craftsmanship. The high-quality 22K gold ensures lasting value, while the brilliant-cut diamonds add a touch of glamour. The Vanki design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long lasting shine and a beautiful luster.
